snippet: Highway rest stops with their rustic designs can be seen as the unrecognized icons of America’s open road. The photographer Ryann Ford has made it her mission to document them.
abstract: Highway rest stops with their rustic designs can be seen as the unrecognized icons of America’s open road. The photographer Ryann Ford has made it her mission to document them.

headline.main: Document | A Photographer's Pit Stops Along America's Highways
